steps.name: Before Hooks
beforeEach hook
Fixture "browser"
Launch browser
Create context
Create page
Navigate to "/bugs-form"
Input On Text Field: Enter first name with Text: TestUserFirstName

Wait for selector locator('//input[@placeholder="Enter first name" or @label="Enter first name" or @name="Enter first name"]\n     | //textarea[@placeholder="Enter first name" or @label="Enter first name" or @name="Enter first name"]\n     | //div[div[label[contains(string(), "Enter first name")]]]//textarea')

Fill "TestUserFirstName" locator('//input[@placeholder="Enter first name" or @label="Enter first name" or @name="Enter first name"]\n     | //textarea[@placeholder="Enter first name" or @label="Enter first name" or @name="Enter first name"]\n     | //div[div[label[contains(string(), "Enter first name")]]]//textarea')
Input On Text Field: Enter last name with Text: TestUserLastName

Wait for selector locator('//input[@placeholder="Enter last name" or @label="Enter last name" or @name="Enter last name"]\n     | //textarea[@placeholder="Enter last name" or @label="Enter last name" or @name="Enter last name"]\n     | //div[div[label[contains(string(), "Enter last name")]]]//textarea')

Fill "TestUserLastName" locator('//input[@placeholder="Enter last name" or @label="Enter last name" or @name="Enter last name"]\n     | //textarea[@placeholder="Enter last name" or @label="Enter last name" or @name="Enter last name"]\n     | //div[div[label[contains(string(), "Enter last name")]]]//textarea')
Input On Text Field: Enter phone number with Text: 0919123456789

Wait for selector locator('//input[@placeholder="Enter phone number" or @label="Enter phone number" or @name="Enter phone number"]\n     | //textarea[@placeholder="Enter phone number" or @label="Enter phone number" or @name="Enter phone number"]\n     | //div[div[label[contains(string(), "Enter phone number")]]]//textarea')

Fill "0919123456789" locator('//input[@placeholder="Enter phone number" or @label="Enter phone number" or @name="Enter phone number"]\n     | //textarea[@placeholder="Enter phone number" or @label="Enter phone number" or @name="Enter phone number"]\n     | //div[div[label[contains(string(), "Enter phone number")]]]//textarea')
Select From Dropdown Option: Philippines
Wait for selector locator('//div[label[contains(text(), "Country")]]/select')
Select option locator('//div[label[contains(text(), "Country")]]/select')
Input On Text Field: Enter email with Text: mail@gmail.com

Wait for selector locator('//input[@placeholder="Enter email" or @label="Enter email" or @name="Enter email"]\n     | //textarea[@placeholder="Enter email" or @label="Enter email" or @name="Enter email"]\n     | //div[div[label[contains(string(), "Enter email")]]]//textarea')

Fill "mail@gmail.com" locator('//input[@placeholder="Enter email" or @label="Enter email" or @name="Enter email"]\n     | //textarea[@placeholder="Enter email" or @label="Enter email" or @name="Enter email"]\n     | //div[div[label[contains(string(), "Enter email")]]]//textarea')
Input On Text Field: Password with Text: Pass123

Wait for selector locator('//input[@placeholder="Password" or @label="Password" or @name="Password"]\n     | //textarea[@placeholder="Password" or @label="Password" or @name="Password"]\n     | //div[div[label[contains(string(), "Password")]]]//textarea')

Fill "Pass123" locator('//input[@placeholder="Password" or @label="Password" or @name="Password"]\n     | //textarea[@placeholder="Password" or @label="Password" or @name="Password"]\n     | //div[div[label[contains(string(), "Password")]]]//textarea')
Select Checkbox: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
